/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
